advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: We’ve improved the app experience with bug fixes, performance enhancements, and support for iOS 26, including a new mini player design and improved responsiveness of the home screen.
description:
Welcome to Podme! The place for your favorite podcasts and audiobooks. Podme offers a fresh and broad selection of premium podcast and audiobook content. Try it for free!

With Podme you can access podcasts within entertainment, lifestyle, humour, sports as well as documentaries and true crime, and a wide range of audiobooks from fiction and crime to feel-good and biographies. Try one of our Premium subscriptions, 14 days for free! You can terminate your subscription whenever you want. All of our premium podcasts and audiobooks are ad-free. 

A WIDE SELECTION PODCASTS AND AUDIOBOOKS
At Podme you will find some of Finland/Norway/Sweden's most popular podcasts and some of the biggest podcast profiles within every genre, from talk shows to true crime, comedy to sports, in-depth interviews to hard-hitting documentaries. Plus a wide range of audiobooks from fiction and crime, to feel-good and biographies. And of-course, everthing inbetween. [For the local version you now need to add some sentences around podcast and audiobook conten, as well as podcast profiles and authors that you think may be searched on, for example Here you can listen to nerve-wracking stories and shocking revelations in Podme Dokumentär, En Mörk Historia or Inför rätta. If you’re into sports, check out Sweden’s biggest football podcast Tutto Balutto or get guided through Formula 1 with Viaplay F1-podcast. When it’s time to laugh, turn on JLC – Mellan Himmel och Jord or join Filip & Fredrik in Filip och Fredrik svarar. You can also dive into gripping audiobooks like Paradis City by Jens Lapidus, En bur av guld by Camilla Läckberg, or Hypnotisören by Lars Kepler. Whether you’re into true crime, thrillers, or unforgettable drama – it’s all in one app.]

ADVANTAGES WITH PREMIUM AND PREMIUM TOTAL
To get access to all premium podcasts you need to subscribe to Premium. To get access to all audiobooks and premium podcasts you need to subscribe to Premium Total. With Premium you will get:
- Access to exlusive and ad-free premium podcasts
- The opportunity to listen offline
- Listen to podcasts on iOS or CarPlay
With Premium Total you will have access to everything in Premium, plus a wide selection of bestselling audiobooks – all in the same app.

THIS IS HOW IT WORKS:
- Download the app
- Create an account
- Sign up for a free trial
- Start listening to you favorite podcast or audiobook
- If you are a student, get your 50% student discount on our Premium subscription

If you terminate your free trial before it ends, you will not be charged.

Podme is a podcast streaming service that operates in the Finnish, Norwegian and Swedish market, and we are constantly working on expanding our podcast and audiobook offering.

If you have any questions, please reach out to support@podme.com and we will help you out.

Terms of use: https://podme.com/se/anvandarvillkor
Privacy policy:  https://podme.com/se/integritetspolicy
